about_the_game:
Welcome to a world of curious and playful cats!
Take in five fluffy companions who need a new home. Help them settle in by solving 3D puzzles, explore cozy locations, and enjoy their charming adventures as they get used to their new life.

Game Features:

  • Help the cats find their places: a basket, a couch, or even a Christmas tree.

  • Choose a cat, plan its jump, and watch as it leaps toward the goal.

  • Each cat has unique jumping abilities, making every challenge a little different.

  • Move objects to create the perfect path for your furry friends.

  • Look for hiding cats and guide them out of their secret spots.

  • Uncover hidden details about their kind and caring owner.

By the numbers:

  • 1 warmhearted owner

  • 5 lovable and quirky cats

  • 36 vibrant and cozy locations

  • 50 exciting and varied levels

Help your cats settle in, share joyful moments, and experience their playful and endearing lives together.

name: CatTris Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You’ve been ambushed by five adorable kittens! Take them home, solve fun 3D puzzles to help them settle in, and enjoy their playful tricks. Share both the joyful moments and the challenges with your new furry friends.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Azerbaijani, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Afrikaans, Basque, Belarusian, Bangla, Bosnian, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Dari, Zulu, Hebrew, Igbo, Irish, Icelandic, Yoruba, Kazakh, Kannada, Catalan, Quechua, Kinyarwanda, K'iche', Konkani, Xhosa, Khmer, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, Serbian, Sotho, Sinhala, Sindhi, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Uzbek, Uyghur, Urdu, Filipino, Hausa, Hindi, Croatian, Cherokee, Scots, Estonian
